scripts.build-all: ng build --project=@mckit/core --configuration production && ng build --project=@mckit/loader --configuration production && ng build --project=@mckit/auth --configuration production && ng build --project=@mckit/filter --configuration production && ng build --project=@mckit/layout-core --configuration production && ng build --project=@mckit/table --configuration production && ng build --project=@mckit/odata --configuration production && ng build --project=@mckit/layout --configuration production && ng build --project=@mckit/layout-sakai --configuration production && ng build --project=@mckit/cron --configuration production && ng build --project=@mckit/layout-fuse --configuration production && ng build --project=@mckit/form --configuration production && ng build --project=@mckit/monaco-field --configuration production
scripts.upload-npm: ng build --project=@mckit/core --configuration production && npm publish dist/mckit/core --access public && ng build --project=@mckit/layout --configuration production && npm publish dist/mckit/layout --access public && ng build --project=@mckit/auth --configuration production && npm publish dist/mckit/auth --access public && ng build --project=@mckit/loader --configuration production && npm publish dist/mckit/loader --access public && ng build --project=@mckit/filter --configuration production && npm publish dist/mckit/filter --access public && ng build --project=@mckit/table --configuration production && npm publish dist/mckit/table --access public
scripts.upload-npm-odata: ng build --project=@mckit/odata --configuration production && npm publish dist/mckit/odata --access public
